name: EPOSbox
description: The MDC & KFD repo made for you 🍃

packages.name: FontManager
packages.author: EPOS
packages.long_description: FontManager allows you to change your System, Clock & Emoji font to a custom one straight through purekfd!!

packages.name: SoundManager
packages.author: EPOS
packages.description: The only sound changer you'll ever need!
packages.long_description:
SoundManager allows you to change your system sounds with ease. With over 90 included sound options!!

Even including the option to select your own custom sounds!

packages.name: SettingsManager
packages.author: EPOS
packages.description: The all in one settings customizer
packages.long_description:
SettingsManager allows you to change your settings icons to your own custom icons!!

It also give you the ability to add a custom image on the top of your settings list!

(More features planned for future releases)

packages.name: NoVulnTools2
packages.author: tyler1029
packages.description: The best toolbox for your device
packages.long_description:
NoVulnTools is an all in one toolbox for your devices
It has:

• UI Animation Speed
• Custom side button speed
• Playing sound upon pasting things
• Your build version in the CC or status bar
• Haptic upon wake for iPhone
• Better battery information

And much more.

Once you have configured your options head to Settings ➜ General.

packages.name: QuickActionColor
packages.author: tyler1029
packages.description: Give your lockscreen a unique look
packages.long_description: Changes your lockscreen toggle color.

packages.name: AppCC
packages.author: tyler1029
packages.description: Launching apps from the Control Center with ease
packages.long_description: AppCC Allows you to launch any application from the Control Center, It includes some preset applications or you can use a custom Bundle ID to an application currently installed on your device.

packages.name: CarPlayWP
packages.author: EPOS
packages.long_description:
CarPlayWP gives you the ability to change your CarPlay Wallpaper to whatever you like.

With just a few clicks in the tweak settings you can enjoy your very own wallpaper!!

packages.name: MuteAnimation
packages.author: tyler1029 & EPOS
packages.long_description: Changes your silent pill to a custom image or animation.

packages.name: LSFootnote
packages.author: tyler1029
packages.long_description: This tweak allows you to simply add a footnote saying anything you like right above the home bar on the lockscreen.

packages.name: FrostedUI
packages.author: tyler1029
packages.description: Completely change the way iOS looks
packages.long_description: FrostedUI - Revolutionise the way you view your notifications, control center, app library, 3D touch menus, folders, widgets and even UI alerts

packages.name: ModernCC
packages.author: EPOS
packages.description: Give your Control Center a modern look
packages.long_description:
This tweak gives your Control Center a more modern look and feel!

Made possible with 14DND by nbxy <3

packages.name: Pulsar LS UI
packages.author: EPOS
packages.long_description:
Change your lockscreen flashlight and camera icons into Pulsar

Inspired by Pulsar Control Center UI made by Phuc Do

packages.name: Gradient Passcode & Phone
packages.author: EPOS & Z3ROS1X
packages.long_description: Change your Passcode & Phone Dialer keys to this beautiful Gradient Theme designed by ⦅ᴢᴇʀɵsɪx⦆

packages.name: Wayfinder Clock
packages.author: EPOS
packages.long_description: This tweak changes the appearance of your iOS clock icon to the Wayfinder watch face From WATCH

packages.name: Engage Charging Sound
packages.author: EPOS
packages.long_description: Change your default charging sound to the Apple AirPower wireless charging sound

packages.name: Debug Stoofs
packages.author: tyler1029
packages.long_description: Debug Stoofs allows you to enable a few debugging options.

packages.name: Classic Settings
packages.author: EPOS
packages.long_description:
Relive the old days with Classic Settings

This theme changes your settings icons into the iOS 6 icons.

packages.name: FelicitySettings
packages.author: tyler1029 & EPOS
packages.description: a more colorful & detailed look for your settings
packages.long_description: FelicitySettings takes everything that is great with the default iOS icon design and pushes it further.

packages.name: Vivacity Settings
packages.author: tyler1029 & EPOS
packages.description: A Vibrant Theme to Light up Your Settings!
packages.long_description: Vivacity Settings takes everything that is great about default iOS design and gives it a modern and vibrant spin.

packages.name: Double Bubble Settings
packages.author: tyler1029 & EPOS
packages.long_description:
A modern and fresh rework of bubblegum settings. Features pastel colors that work well with any setup; light or dark!

(currently VPN, FaceID & Wallet icons don't theme properly, if a fix is found we will push out an update.)

packages.name: Morandi Settings
packages.author: tyler1029 & EPOS
packages.long_description: Morandi Settings gives your settings a new color and feel in the style of Morandi's paintings.

packages.name: Nothing Clock Font (iOS 15)
packages.author: EPOS
packages.long_description:
Change your iOS 15 clock font to the Nothing clock font!

Ported to iOS 15 by me and extracted from Nothing OS by HackZy
